title: Frontend Developer
description: Ora Organic is a tech-enabled digitally native startup (think Warby Parker, Bonobos, or Everlane of nutrition), primarily focused on selling direct through its website, as well as on Amazon. With new sales channels opening up domestically and internationally in the next few months, the ideal candidate will have extensive experience working with front-end technologies for e-commerce stores, including JS, jQuery, HTML, CSS, SASS and Shopify Liquid. On top of that, you will have a solid grasp on concepts like SEO, Conversion Rate Optimization, A/B Testing (Optimizely, Google Optimize), Pixel Tracking, and an intuition for what makes a great User Experience. Additional knowledge of SQL, d3.js, RoR, AnimeJS a great bonus.
